text: David Sehat is an American academic. He is a professor of American intellectual and cultural history at Georgia State University. He was the 2017-18 John G. Winant Visiting Professor of American Government at the Rothermere American Institute and Balliol College, Oxford. He is the author of two books. He won the Organization of American Historians's 2012 Frederick Jackson Turner Award for The Myth of American Religious Freedom. ==Works== * * ==References== Category:Living people Category:Georgia State University faculty Category:21st-century American historians Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: David Sehat
